sentences.sContent: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
sentences.sCn: 帕科三大步就走到了门口。

sentences.sContent: They were joined by a newcomer who came striding across a field.
sentences.sCn: 他们中又来了个新人，那人穿过一块田地大步走过来。

synos.tran: 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在…

words.tran: 阔步走路的人；[昆] 水黾

trans.tranOther: a long step you make while you are walking

trans.tranCn: 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在…
trans.tranOther: If you stride somewhere, you walk there with quick, long steps
